PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: lords attending on the Princess of France.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO, a fantastical Spaniard.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The king of Navarre's park.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter FERDINAND king of Navarre, BIRON, LONGAVILLE
and DUMAIN
Enter DULL with a letter, and COSTARD

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO and MOTH

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter the PRINCESS of France, ROSALINE, MARIA,
KATHARINE, BOYET, Lords, and other Attendants

Enter FERDINAND, LONGAVILLE, DUMAIN, BIRON, and
Attendants

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO and MOTH

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter the PRINCESS, and her train, a Forester,
BOYET, ROSALINE, MARIA, and KATHARINE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter HOLOFERNES, SIR NATHANIEL, and DULL

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BIRON

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter HOLOFERNES, SIR NATHANIEL, and DULL
Enter DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO, MOTH, and COSTARD

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter the PRINCESS, KATHARINE, ROSALINE, and MARIA

Enter Blackamoors with music; MOTH; FERDINAND,
BIRON, LONGAVILLE, and DUMAIN, in Russian habits,
and masked

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MOTH
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: The Ladies turn their backs to him

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt PRINCESS, ROSALINE, KATHARINE, and MARIA

Re-enter FERDINAND, BIRON, LONGAVILLE, and DUMAIN,
in their proper habits

Re-enter the PRINCESS, ushered by BOYET, ROSALINE,
MARIA, and KATHARINE
Converses apart with FERDINAND, and delivers him a paper
Enter HOLOFERNES, for Judas; and MOTH, for Hercules
Enter DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO, for Hector

SPEECH.SPEAKER: DON ADRIANO DE ARMADO
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Re-enter HOLOFERNES, SIR NATHANIEL, MOTH, COSTARD,
and others
